item.title: Cant Wait for Mine
item.description: Amazing storyü•≤: A guy from our Discord found a poor cat in the garden. The cat had an animal RFID tag implant (FDX-B 134kHz), so he scanned it with Flipper, found the cat's owner via the local animal ID database, and they were reunited Turned out that üêà was missing for 2 years!
